title: E95 A Wendigo Named Megan and a Winnebago in the Woods
description:
Happy Thanksgiving weekend, everyone! Let's all pray to Gio's butt curtain that Christine doesn't get eaten by a flesh-eating monster on her honeymoon because this week Em covers the folklore of the creepy cannibal, the Wendigo. Meanwhile Christine brings us the heartbreaking story of the murders of Hannah Graham and Morgan Harrington, a case that intersects with Em's alma mater. We also may have coerced Blaise into starting a band called, "Blaise and the Jaguars"... and that's why we drink!



Please consider supporting the companies that support us! 



Get 15% off your first Thirdlove order when you go to thirdlove.com/drink



Get a free stock to help build your portfolio when you sign up with Robin Hood! Go to drink.robinhood.com



Get your first Quip refill pack for free when you go to getquip.com/atwwd



Get 20% off your first order of Bombas socks when you go to bombas.com/drink
author: andthatswhywedrink@gmail.com (Kast Media)
